summary: Two unemployed Chinese teenagers have trouble resisting the temptations of the Western world.
cast: Wei Wei Zhao|Qiong Wu|Tao Zhao|Qing Feng Zhou|Hongwei Wang|Ru Bai|Xi An Liu|Shou Lin Xu|Dao Xiao|Zi Ying|Zhubin Li|Min Liu|Ai Jun Ren|Limin Wang|Zhangke Jia|Juan Antonio Samaranch
title: Ren xiao yao
